short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See a random Netrunner card on new tabs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inspired by a wonderful little extension by Taulant Sulko for Magic: The Gathering, this app displays a random card from the Android: Netrunner card game on new tabs.

Credits: Code is by Nick Evans. Images and card info are pulled with the NetrunnerDB public API.
